website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for sensitive scalps, this non-irritating shampoo cleanses residue including dry skin and product buildup, which can cause your hair to be oily.
pros: Completely cleans hair to make it soft, light, and rejuvenated
Removes buildup from other hair products
Mild formula works for all hair types
cons: Some don't love the smell of this shampoo

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY- This product will ruin your hair.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shampoo a few months ago and I used it 1-2 times a week for about 3 weeks before I had to stop. It caused my scalp to become super red, irritated, and itchy and then also caused my hair to fall and thin out, leaving huge bald spots in certain sections of my head. This product is NOT WORTH IT. Especially if you have sensitive skin or scalp. I have spent MONTHS trying to get my hair back to where it once was and talked with my hair stylist who said she knows multiple people who have had reactions to this same product. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstyn Grani

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I just used this for the first time tonight and I am so impressed!! My hair has never felt this soft and clean! And it feels lighter! I feel like I just stripped years of nasty off my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Somerville

customer_reviews.title: great for thin hair that gets greasy quickly
customer_reviews.text: i have really thin hair & it literally gets greasy 24 hours after i shower. it’s important i don’t use much product in my hair to prevent build up and extra grease and weigh-down. i religiously use this everytime i wash my hair (every other day), towel dry after shower, use leave-in conditioner. i am the most picky when it comes to hair, skin, body products & this shampoo is the best clarifying shampoo i’ve ever had and it smells refreshing. well worth the money will always use this.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Not for Locs.
customer_reviews.text: Not very good on locs. It may be anti-residue but its not very good at cleaning hair and removing residue from other products. Everytime I used it it only made residue in my hair MORE visible after rinsing it out and drying my locs, even if i repeated.
customer_reviews.author: dieumerci

customer_reviews.title: Good product for most
customer_reviews.text: I first used this product about 20yrs ago. Lately my hair had felt kind of weighed down. I use high end shampoo/conditioner (I’m a licensed professional). I didn’t notice too much of a difference, so clearly build up wasn’t my issue. That said, if you use grocery store product lines, this is the addition you’ll need weekly to keep your hair care routine spot on. Those products tend to be high in wax which is what gives that appearance of shine. This will strip that wax out, so use extra conditioner as to avoid tangling.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Did not help
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a moisturizing shampoo and conditioner for awhile (trying to get through the bottle) that weighs down my hair and makes it quite flat. I bought this Neutrogena to deep cleanse to try to remove any residue and give my hair a little lift again, but it did not help at all, and my hair was just as flat as when using the other shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Lifts residue, but not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect from an anti-residue shampoo. This definitely lifts off oil, dirt, caked on hair product. It has a more masculine scent than neutral. It isn’t too heavy but sometimes I do smell it throughout the day. You have to use a bit more product than a normal shampoo, it doesn’t leather as well. I have been using once a week and following with a fortifying conditioner - my hair does feel lighter after. I would highly recommend using a conditioner afterwards or I think your hair would be completely tangled and dry. Overall, it works for lifting residue. I’ll use the bottle but may test out other products next time!
customer_reviews.author: JSMeff

customer_reviews.title: Removes literally everything!... smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: Well, okay 3 stars because 1) Yes, it does remove buildup. 2) It removes pretty much every oil on your head - for better or worse. 3) You know when you're doing a sniff test on all the different colognes at Sephora or Ulta and you come to that one that you're like 'uggghhh-cough-cough! Pass me the coffee beans!' It's like that but for shampoos. I'm pretty confident that no one would purposely choose this scent for any use of scent in their life.
customer_reviews.author: Mareva

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair feel “like new”
customer_reviews.text: This product is hard to describe because it’s so awesome. I have very curly (Caucasian) hair. I use a lot of hair products and hair spray to keep my curls from getting frizzy. I use this shampoo once a week to strip all of the residue out. After using the shampoo, my hair feel so clean and bouncy, almost like a child’s hair. I feel like my curls have looked better since I’ve started using this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: HopeHD

customer_reviews.title: My Locs loved this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: My hair has been in a loc style since 2014 and I wash my locs quarterly. I had buildup from a deep cleaning concoction with vinegar baking soda and some other BS that left my locs looking more dirty than before. THIS PRODUCT FREAKIN WORKS! I washed twice and the first bowl of water was a dark brownish gray color. Now when I was my locs I know I’m getting a detox deep clean result.
customer_reviews.author: Billmil

customer_reviews.title: Strips your hair of everything
customer_reviews.text: Well it definitely removes the residue, but it strips your hair of everything else too. Leaving your hair dry and brittle. I follow up with moisturizing shampoo, but honestly I don't know if it's better for your hair to leave some residue in or completely strip it as this shampoo does. Can't have healthy hair if it's all broken off because it's so dry.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for locs!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a review in a loc group about this removing product build up. I ordered it and was shocked at how dirty my locs were! I was my hair weekly with a deep treatment once a week and I couldn’t believe how dark gray the water was! My hair felt lighter but it did need a good moisturizer afterwards. I recommend this product to EVERYONE!!!! I use this once or twice a month with my wash routine.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: This item needs to be shipped in a plastic bag, or taped shut
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo is good, smells nice, etc, but the bottle is not sealed, so it arrived leaking shampoo over all the other items in the box. My bag of snacks still smells like shampoo, despite washing it and everything else (fortunately there were no paper items in the box). My bottle of lotion was also just thrown in the box without plastic around it, but it had just leaked all over itself and not on everything else in the box. I will try to only order things that won't leak, in the future, and I will buy my shampoo at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Diane D

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because of the good reviews here but I’m totally disappointed with this buying. The smell is awful, it smells like an old chemical soap! I didn't pay attention to the ingredients. Sodium Laureth Sulfate is the 2nd ingredient in it! Its a bad chemical for the hair health! It helps to clean out the dirt better that a shampoo without it but SLS can strip the skin/head of its natural oils which can cause irritation, dry sculp/skin and etc
customer_reviews.author: M.A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: If you have an oily scalp, this product will help get your hair squeaky clean. I have somewhat hard water and this helps to get all the greasy mineral junk out of my hair during the wash. It does contain citric acid which can act as a chelating agent as well as ph stabilizer to products. I have found my hair does tangle more with this product. I just use a TINY bit of conditioner to help detangle my hair. If you have coarse or processed hair this product may make your hair too dry if used very frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in removing shampoo residue
customer_reviews.text: For many years, I've turned to this product to remove the build-up of residue from other shampoos and conditioners. I use this one about once a week just to give a boost to my other products. It's like a fresh start every time. At one point, I wondered if I just switched to ANY other product would it have the same effect. The answer is no. This one, by far, helped clean my hair thoroughly and left my hair ready for whatever else I added. It works great especially with the Neutrogena Triple Moisture Daily Deep Conditioner that comes in a squeeze tube.
customer_reviews.author: Roselyn McMahon

customer_reviews.title: always does a good job of removing build up on hair
customer_reviews.text: my hair is fine and it gets bogged down with the stuff in shampoos. I also used a silicone detangler and smoothing serum so my hair needs a good cleaning once a week or so. I don't like any scents, so can't rate the odor of this product more than a 3. it doesn't smell too bad and does not leave any odor on my hair. It cleans so well, my hair is bouncy and shiny after once use. it's a good product, and I am super picky about what I use on my hair. It does not moisturize at all.
customer_reviews.author: Not available

customer_reviews.title: NEW FAN
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this shampoo! It left my over-processed/bleached hair squeaky clean and not feeling like dry grass. I left Neutrogena Triple Moisture Deep Recovery Hair Mask Moisturizer For Dry Hair in for 20 minutes after towel drying my hair and absolutely loved the result. My hair felt silky soft with no frizz and for the first time in a long while, I could just let my hair air dry. Some reviews mentioned that they disliked the smelI of the shampoo, but I can honestly say that I was not even aware of any smell. I am a forever fan!
customer_reviews.author: Opinionated

customer_reviews.title: Great product, awesomeprice, fix packaging though
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described. Do not want to call out seller but packaging of products for transport leaves much to be desired. Picture illustrates how box arrived. Without packaging inside of box it allows one bottle to bump open the flip top type cap slightly which resulted in a small loss of shampoo. Thankfully it must have happened towards end of shipping/delivery process as it was not a complete mess. Going forwards I can hope that it is shipped with better packaging to prevent a potential carified mess, as this a subscription item for my household.
customer_reviews.author: Martin R Fox

customer_reviews.title: I noticed differences right while rinsing my hair
customer_reviews.text: My friend indicated me this product and it was totally worth it for me. I felt my hair softer right after rinsing it and I didn’t have even to put on conditioner. The smell is perfect and the scent is very strong. It’s been 3 days that I washed my hair with it, and it still smells very good.
customer_reviews.author: F V

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Just wow! Only used once so far but wow it worked soo good! I had sooo much buildup on my hair it was gross. Didnt have high expectations when i decided to order it but its amazing! Used this once and my hair feels sooo clean and amazing! For the price order it! So glad i did!
customer_reviews.author: ashlee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this purifying shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shampoo several months ago after my hairdresser recommended I start using a purifying shampoo to remove product residue. Of course my hairdresser recommended an expensive name brand shampoo that I just could not afford. Enter this shampoo! I use this shampoo once a week and notice that my hair is lighter and easier to work after. I also LOVE the scent! I would recommend this product for anyone looking to purify their hair without spending a lot of $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Build up be gone
customer_reviews.text: Clarifying for sure. I normally use a co wash which is like a conditioner but that’s all I use. I added this to my routine once per week to clarify and get rid of build up. It’s amazing. My heart feels so healthy. My hair absorbs the nutrients from my conditioner so much better after this shampoo that my hair is unbelievably shiny and healthy. I love this and will buy it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Clarifying shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I love this clarifying shampoo. I have naturally oily hair and this stuff really cleans my hair/scalp - I have also found it to be gentle enough to use daily. My hair does not feel brittle after shampooing which I was afraid of - really leaves it pretty soft..though I do follow up with conditioner still.
customer_reviews.author: robin a

customer_reviews.title: So clean
customer_reviews.text: I use this and a deep conditioning treatment once a week. This clarifying shampoo definitely gets rid of all the product build up from the week. A warning to those who home color...it does seem to strip your hair of the dye a bit. I'm probably going to have to recolor a week earlier than I did before using this.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Amazon bag your liquids for shipment!
customer_reviews.text: Come on Amazon merchandise handlers, you should be trained better than that! Bag up your liquids, ugh. It got all over my 3 items (clothes and kitchen item not shown).
customer_reviews.author: TKW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Does what it says it does.
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I used this shampoo, I could tell an immediate difference in my hair, especially after it was dry. I've been using Nioxin shampoo and conditioner to help remedy some stress-related hairloss and there's no doubt in my mind that using this once a week has been a benefit to my routine. My hair looks better than it has in months! The only complaint I have is that it smells a lot like baby oil. But I can deal! This is one of those products that I'll continue buying, without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Michalski

customer_reviews.title: Cuts through build-up!
customer_reviews.text: I have curly hair and I have to use a lot of product to keep the frizzies away. After awhile, my hair stops feeling clean when I get out of the shower (and more like I have a film of leftover product coating my tresses. Yuck.) So after reading the last reviews I purchased this and wow!! It cuts through all the buildup I accumulate in my hair! No more “ghosts of products past” for me. ;-) I use this once every 1-2 weeks to keep my hair clean and shiny. And compared to the price of other clarifying shampoos, you simply can’t beat it! I will be putting this on my subscribe and save list from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Herum

customer_reviews.title: The best for removing old residue from hair, and the fragrance is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this shampoo for years. Not every time because I feel that it does dry my hair out a bit, but to get all old residue out of hair it’s the best! I use it maybe every third shampoo, and your hair is so shiny and clean! The smell is wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: I was SHOCKED at the results!! 😁
customer_reviews.text: Normally, I dont write a review unless the product actually does what it said it would....and this shampoo did! I was truly shocked. My hair is long and I had MONTHS of chalky hard water, bad shampoo, and heavy conditioner build-up on my flat locks. Literally ONE heavy application and lather of this product left my hair so much lighter and smoother! My husband actually complimented it.....LOL! Just make sure you lather hard for like 2 mins to get off all the gunk. Great price for excellent results. I'll buy this again for sure! The smell isn't superb, but who cares! It fixed the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer with oily hair. I have to wash my hair every single day. If I don't do it, it will look really disgusting. This shampoo is just amazing. It cleans deeply and I can at least skip one day wash. Also, it brings shine and smoothness to my hair. Finally I feel having healthy hair. It does what promises to do.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Scudeller Umeda

customer_reviews.title: Hair feels so soft and clean
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a clarifying shampoo before but my hair had been feeling grimy and weighed down lately so I wanted to give it a shot. SO happy I did! I used this followed by my normal conditioner and it came out feeling so clean (if a little dry). I didn't do anything to my hair for two days (no straightener, no hair dryer, no products) and just let get its natural oils back. This morning I washed/conditioned my hair like normal and blow dried it and it feels AMAZING. So soft and clean. I can tell it removed so much build up. I highly recommend this if your hair needs a lift!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M

customer_reviews.title: Clean but dry hair
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very string cleansing product. Cleans the scalp extremely well. But you have to be careful and really focus on applying it only onto the scalp and not the hair shaft. It makes hair feel super dry and brittle. Good conditioner helps but still, you can’t use it everyday. Once a week maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Best inexpensive clarifying shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is the best clarifying shampoo I’ve found for the price. It works perfectly without a strong scent. Leaves my hair literally squeaky clean. I use it once a week to remove build up. I wouldn’t use it as a daily shampoo though because it would dry your hair out if used too often.
customer_reviews.author: AmyVsings

customer_reviews.title: Removes Hair Product Residue
customer_reviews.text: I like this shampoo. I use it once a week to get rid of the shampoo residue from my other shampoos. This really seems to remove any residue and this does in fact appear to make the other shampoos more effective. I'm going to continue using this shampoo. I would recommend this to anyone who frequently uses hair products or shampoos that may leave some residue.
customer_reviews.author: AKP

customer_reviews.title: I wonder if the formula has changed from years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I used to use this product on a regular basis. I found the scent now to be a bit strong for me. I don't think it cleaned as deeply as what I used years ago. I thought it was drying to the scalp. I'll be able to use it, but plan to try something different in the future.
customer_reviews.author: MaryMartha

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to try this but it really did not do much. I could still feel product residue in my hair. Not sure how many times you need to use it to get the results. The smell is nice though.
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: Still the best!
customer_reviews.text: I use this shampoo at least once a week before my regular charcoal shampoo & conditioner. Between the hard water and styling products, I get buildup pretty fast on my oily hair. All these years, and I've still never found a better clarifying shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Erwood

customer_reviews.title: A miracle if you have hard water!
customer_reviews.text: My hair has gotten so damaged from hard water after we moved three years ago. I tried everything under the sun to strip out the moisture sucking mineral deposits from club soda rinses to expensive hard water shampoo/conditioner systems. I read about this and figured it was worth a shot and I'm so glad I did! It is the only thing that works to remove the build-up and keep my hair and scalp healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Jones

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair squeaky clean!
customer_reviews.text: I have thin fine hair and bought to get some semi permanent blue dye out of my hair before getting professionally colored. It has worked very well!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun & Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great for washing after oil masks
customer_reviews.text: I use hot oil masks on my very dry, fragile, wavy hair once a week, and this shampoo gets ALL the oil out in just one wash. Just beware that it is very clarifying and very drying. I use a deep conditioner afterward so it doesn’t dry my hair out. If you have trouble washing oil treatments out, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: B.A.

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for residue removal but I wpuld also reccomend a hydrating shampoo with it. Overall I will be using this product for years to come and i wish I knew about it earlier. Would reccomend for people who use product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  I've used it for years
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I've used it for years. I use it about 1 time per week to remove hair product build up. I, personally don't recommend it for every day use because it's a clarifying shampoo. So, use a moisturizer after you use it. But, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jan G.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not moisturizing, but I don't think it's intended to be. This shampoo is meant for occasional use when product and other shampoos build up in your hair. It definitely does the job. Refreshes my hair so I can have a clean start
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Deloge

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t do much of anything
customer_reviews.text: Water is very hard where I live, so I thought I’d dry something to remove buildup. A little goes a long way with this stuff, and it suds up extremely well. I’ve got 2+ ft worth of hair and a little dollop can cover all of it. But I don’t think it’s made much of a difference at all. May have actually dried out my hair to be honest. Also didn’t like the strong scent.
customer_reviews.author: Indy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo does what it is supposed to do - I think. I bought it to enhance my purple shampoo for blonde hair, which it doesn’t really do. But my hair definitely feels super clean with no residue. It does leave hair really dry, but that is to be assumed with a deep cleaning shampoo. No scent that I can smell.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: The Best ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years .I always get compliments along with never using conditioner on my hair, just use about a dime to nickle when you use this..I wash my hair 2 to three time a day ... This is a Great Product....
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this since I the mid-1970s. I use it about every two weeks to remove the build up on my hair from the other hair care products I use to allow my shampoo and conditioner of choice to work better.
customer_reviews.author: Star Child

customer_reviews.title: Fav product for removing residue
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shampoo for removing residue. If you hair has become difficult to comb, it may be because of product build-up. Use a good conditioner after this because it is drying but the hair is left very manageable afterwards. Smells amazing, one of my favorite products and I will continue to purchase
customer_reviews.author: Viola

customer_reviews.title: great shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: i tried this shampoo after using really heavy purple shampoo for a long time - i was amazed at how much CLEANER and smoother my hair felt! it really removes all of the residue that is built up from other products + not washing daily. i wash my hair about every 4 days or so, and i just rotate it with my regular shampoo. i will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Klemmer

customer_reviews.title: Effective. Pleasant scent that is gender neutral.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 20 years, and the product is remarkably unchanged during that time. The shampoo does truly rinse clean. If you tend to get blocked pores from other shampoos, then this is what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Maneki Neko

customer_reviews.title: Great product, horrible state on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. However, cap wasn't tight on the bottle while being shipped. Product spilled in the box all over other items included a brand new book. Quite unhappy with the state the contents arrived in.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Summers

customer_reviews.title: One of my must buy item on amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I usually use it once every week, it helps deep clean my scalp. I like how it won’t have the strong chemical smell, those kind of thing are not good for health.
customer_reviews.author: Renee L.

customer_reviews.title: So strong smelling. Choked me in shower.
customer_reviews.text: Don't if it works or not. Only used one time and almost choked to death. So strong smelling. Can't get away from it. Even sitting here after my shower it is all I can smell. I'm returning and will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Does not work to remove build-up
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work to remove build-up. In fact, I think it contributes more build-up rather than cleaning the hair. Plus it smells terrible, which if it worked to remove build-up the scent could be considered “medicinal,” but as it is it just smells unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Stinks
customer_reviews.text: Bad fake perfume smell that lingers long after you wash it out. It's a very cloying smell that makes you feel sick
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good product, does not distort the original color of my hair. Gives me a deep clean and this is safe to use the whole bottle without fear of damaging your hair or changing its natural (or desired) color.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D.

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended because I have soft water and my hair is not coming clean. I notice a slight difference, but not too much. It’s good shampoo but doesn’t really help with the soft water issue
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine, I've used it before; however, whoever boxed this up just threw the bottle in the box without padding or wrapping and with the top partly unscrewed. Got to me with the inside of the box coated with shampoo. Careless. Otherwise, the shampoo is fine.
customer_reviews.author: ARkee

customer_reviews.title: Removes product buildup from hair.
customer_reviews.text: This definitely removes buildup from your hair. However, it can make your hair dry. Especially if you it too often. The good news is that using a good conditioner takes care of that.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful but works great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells so bad but works so good. It left my hair feeling clean and light. It is not mosturizing so make sure to follow up with conditioner or conditioning mask.
customer_reviews.author: LadyTrust625

customer_reviews.title: Works Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: My hair had been feeling dry due to the weather no amount of deep conditioning packets was helping. After washing my hair with this it instantly made my hair feel cleaner and lighter, and then I applied conditioner and my hair felt so soft and clean. Helped give my hair volume by really deep cleaning it. Smells clean not strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: If you haven’t used this shampoo, you’re missing out! This is SO great for gently but thoroughly cleans your hair and scalp. After you use it, other products work better, your hair is soft and truly clean of build-up, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena Anti Residue Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and use it every time I color my hair or if there is a buildup from the hair conditioner. Neutrogena Anti Residue Shampoo leaves ones hair clean and smelling healthy. it does not strip your hair of it natural oil.
customer_reviews.author: Marion D Zottarelli

customer_reviews.title: this stuff WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for practically my whole life. It is the best clarifying shampoo I have ever encountered. It smells good, in my opinion, and the price is super reasonable. It's a great thing to use about once a week to keep buildup out of my hair. I have a dry scalp and this doesn't aggravate it or make me itchy.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: As advertised an amazing product that does exactly what it says. Fabulous scent and cannot recommend enough. Especially great during pool and ocean swim seasons!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Weird shaped bottle but this stuff works great
customer_reviews.text: I really like the scent and the shampoo works as promised. My hair was SO shiny and light feeling after my first use.
customer_reviews.author: Torie

customer_reviews.title: I’ve noticed a significant difference
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed a significant difference in the product buildup in my hair by using this product once a week. I don’t love the smell, but I don’t hate it! Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: swillis

customer_reviews.title: SHAMPOO
customer_reviews.text: MY DERMATOLOGIST TOLD ME THIS PRODUCT WAS FINE TO USE DAILY AS IT IS VERY MILD. HAIR IS SQUEEKY CLEAN AFTER THE FIRST TIME. DIFFICULT TO FIND.
customer_reviews.author: Whitey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! I’ve never used a clarifying shampoo before - big mistake! I can 100% tell the difference after using this product!!! My hair and scalp look refreshed!!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Works good, I use a deep conditioner after. I only use it once a week so I cant say what constant use or anything would do. But works great for me and my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Great for removing the yucky residue from regular shampoos
customer_reviews.text: Hair feels very clean and not sticky or oily residue buildup that you get with a lot of other shampoos. A must once or twice a week, to alternate with regular shampoo, to remove residue/buildup from yucky chemicals they now put in shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Curious

customer_reviews.title: No safety seal
customer_reviews.text: Shampoo arrived with lid partially unscrewed. No safety seal under lid. About 1/4 of shampoo spilled all over box & packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Barclay

customer_reviews.title: Neutragenius
customer_reviews.text: I only use this as my main shampoo I don’t alternate. I’ve had locs for 4 years and so far this hasn’t given me any issues; washes out cleanly. Thankfully it doesn’t have a scent which I prefer and it leaves the scalp feeling clean Can’t ask for more; it is intact drying so I would highly recommend conditioning m(Yes even us with locs)
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ford

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Strips the hair products out of your hair. Not a big fan of the scent. Smells like a perm. I use once a week to thoroughly clean hair
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: My hair feels like I just left the salon!
customer_reviews.text: Was extremely surprised how well this worked for a clarifying shampoo. You can’t beat it for the price and I had tried a few expensive ones before this. This works way better than the high end ones I had tried.
customer_reviews.author: JJdot

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this shampoo as a weekly ritual for years. It has begun to be difficult to find in my local stores, so I checked Amazon.com. The price was reasonable, so I bought a couple of bottles. When they arrived, I was surprised to find thme to be MUCH larger than the retail version, so they are actually a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Laura in Ga

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff! But leave your hair dry!
customer_reviews.text: Cleans very well, gets rid of all residue like it says! It leaves me hair feeling very clean but a little dry! Make sure to moisturize!
customer_reviews.author: Sara DeClercque

customer_reviews.title: Great for weekly use as directed
customer_reviews.text: Needed a product to cleanse my hair of product. For the little amount of products I use, thus works perfect. Light, noninvasive smell, inexpensive product.
customer_reviews.author: Berry

customer_reviews.title: dries out your hair
customer_reviews.text: After shampooing, your hair feels like you have used dish soap. It dries it out. I have used higher end clarifying shampoos that cleaned better without drying. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Mariska Visser

customer_reviews.title: Slight delivbery problem
customer_reviews.text: Shampoo seems fine. But the two 12 oz containers are a bit heavy and one opened up inside the bag. So, I had to wash both off, and dry and check for leaks in plastic. Suggestion...put tape over the tops of this item. The leakage is not so bad and we will keep the two containers. But pass this on to your warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: SonicJourneys

customer_reviews.title: Feels cleansing
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit disappointed that it bragged about being free of chemicals but still contains sodium laurel sulfate which can be quite drying to thin hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Busbee

customer_reviews.title: Love the Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know about clarifying shampoo until I was browsing on Internet, as they recommend Neutrogena I looked it up on Amazon, the price is so surprise and on top of that, it works amazingly with my hair, smells like heaven. Definitely recommend it with anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Lan Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Much needed product for anyone who uses many different hair products on a daily basis. Uses once a week.
customer_reviews.author: True Blue Texan

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily hair
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily and thick hair. Sometimes I will wash my hair in the morning and by evening it looks gross again. Dry shampoo has never worked for me. I bought this in the hopes that it would help, but I was not expecting it to be this amazing. My hair has lots of volume now and I was able to go a few days without washing it. My shampoo and conditioner have also worked better since then. I only use it once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Intensely chemically scented.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible smell that really stays on. I thought the clear and gentle look and labeling would imply a lighter scent too, but it does not.
customer_reviews.author: Resinator

customer_reviews.title: Spilled!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo but it is a shame since I only got half the bottle because it spilled on the way to me.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Edili Rodriguez Medina

customer_reviews.title: Would prefer a different scent
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the musky scent. Wish it smelled fresh. Otherwise you can feel your hair squeaky clean after use.
customer_reviews.author: LAM

customer_reviews.title: Dreds
customer_reviews.text: My stepson uses this for his dreds. My mother in law uses it weekly as needed for clarifying.
customer_reviews.author: Nova Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Must-have if you have well water.
customer_reviews.text: If you have well water, you really need this shampoo to get rid of the mineral build up once a month. It really makes a difference for shine and soft texture.
customer_reviews.author: M. Coy

customer_reviews.title: no more scalp goop
customer_reviews.text: I never had an issue with have a flaky, dirty scalp before until a few months ago. I found myself rubbing my fingertips through my hair often just to pick out the residue off my itchy scalp, disgusted with how much stuff would come out. Regardless of what had caused it, I picked up this shampoo and use a scalp massager every other week and will be sticking to that routine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best clarifying shampoo ever
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! It gets the scalp and hair clean. You can only use it once a week because it strips the hair. But this is necessary for good scalp health. Yes it burns the eyes so try to avoid. I love how this brand makes my hair feel after washing, soft and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kristia

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this product for many years.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for many years. I use it about once or twice a week to help remove mousse type product build-up from my hair. I use different shampoos on the off days. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN K.

customer_reviews.title: dries your hair from removing build up
customer_reviews.text: good product for the price. It strips out everything in one wash, it does dry it out but just follow up with a good conditioner and your hair gets its form back and stays soft. I recommend, I have wavy hair and it helped the body of my hair I use it once weekly.
customer_reviews.author: marissa

customer_reviews.title: Beware bottles leak while shipping
customer_reviews.text: Items arrived with the shampoo leaking all over the box. Plastic bottles were leaking so full amount if product not received. Buy two get one full one 3/4 full and 1/4 leaked and absorbed by box. Just beware of not getting all the product you are paying for. Box smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Sarge

customer_reviews.title: Not deep clean as I needed
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was like deep cleaning ... I had to wash my hair 5 times to deep clean
customer_reviews.author: Renato

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Felt so clean after one use. I normally have very high sebum. My hair gets oily in a day. After using this shampoo, my scalp health increased. It was not oily for atleast 3 days. I love it. Its a must have for your weekly routine.
customer_reviews.author: Sai

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about the authenticity of this..?? (One use in)
customer_reviews.text: Did anyone else receive this item in a plastic page (as opposed to the cardboard box in product photos) and without a safety seal? I thought that was quite sketchy. But I used the product anyway. Won't be awarding any points for the smell... It sort of reminded me of baby oil. But it seemed to lather better than I had hoped and my shampoo went on well after that. Everything except the lack of a seal and proper packaging seems okay to me.
customer_reviews.author: Bidisha B.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I only bought it from here because Walmart and Target are almost consistently out of stock with this product.
customer_reviews.author: k.w.

customer_reviews.title: It actually works
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it for years and swear by it. It pulls out all the product buildup in your hair. Don’t use too often and don’t be afraid that it’s a clear shampoo. Makes your hair feel a little “plasticy” when using but use your other products normally right after and you’ll see the difference. My hair feels like hair again.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

product_meta.title: Neutrogena Anti-Residue Clarifying Shampoo, Gentle Non-Irritating Clarifying Shampoo to Remove Hair Build-Up & Residue, 12 fl. oz
product_meta.description: Instantly remove up to 90% of heavy, dulling residue caused by shampoos, conditioners and styling products with Neutrogena Anti-Residue Clarifying Shampoo. This non-irritating clarifying shampoo cleans your hair and instantly rinses away build-up. Use our revitalizing shampoo only once a week only to find your favorite daily shampoo work even better. The mild formula of this gentle cleansing anti-residue shampoo is non-irritating and works to remove build-up known to cause bad hair days. Designed for all hair types, our anti-residue shampoo also helps boost volume and leaves hair feeling thoroughly cleansed.
feature_bullets: 12-fluid ounce bottle of Neutrogena Anti-Residue Clarifying Shampoo to help remove up to 90% of heavy, dulling residue caused by shampoos, conditioners & styling products
This non-irritating clarifying shampoo gently cleanses your hair and helps boost volume by instantly rinsing away build-up
Use our anti-residue shampoo only once a week to see your favorite daily shampoo work even better, and help stop bad hair days
Weekly clarifying shampoo features a gentle and mild formula that is recommended for all hair types and is gentle enough even for color-treated hair
Gentle hair shampoo is designed as an easy, once-a-week treatment to remove heavy build-up from hair and leaves it feeling thoroughly cleansed

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
